scripts.deploy-local: graph deploy float-capital/float-capital -l v0.0.9 --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020 ./subgraph.ganache.yaml
scripts.deploy-price-history-local: graph deploy float-capital/float-oracle-prices -l v0.0.1 --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020 ./subgraph.priceHistory.ganache.yaml
scripts.deploy-local-matic: graph deploy float-capital/float-capital${POSTFIX} -l v0${LABEL} --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020
scripts.deploy-local-mumbai: graph deploy float-capital/float-capital${POSTFIX} -l v0${LABEL} --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020 ./subgraph.mumbai.yaml
scripts.deploy-local-ftm-testnet: graph deploy float-capital/float-capital${POSTFIX} -l v0${LABEL} --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020 ./subgraph.fantom-testnet.yaml
scripts.deploy-polygon-events-only: SYNC_MODE="EVENTS_ONLY" make set-graph-sync-mode; yarn graph-command deploy float-capital/polygon-mainnet-events --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/; SYNC_MODE="DATA_ONLY" make set-graph-sync-mode;
scripts.deploy-testnet-events-only: SYNC_MODE="EVENTS_ONLY" make set-graph-sync-mode; yarn graph-command deploy float-capital/mumbai-testnet-events --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ ./subgraph.mumbai.original.yaml; SYNC_MODE="DATA_ONLY" make set-graph-sync-mode;
scripts.deploy-avalanche-events-only: SYNC_MODE="EVENTS_ONLY" make set-graph-sync-mode; yarn graph-command deploy float-capital/avalanche-mainnet-events --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ ./subgraph.avalanche.yaml; SYNC_MODE="DATA_ONLY" make set-graph-sync-mode;
scripts.generate-all: yarn entity-helpers-codegen && yarn unit-test-codegen && yarn state-change-codegen
scripts.generate-all-price-history: GQL_SCHEMA='../schema.priceHistory.graphql' GRAPH_CONFIG='./subgraph.priceHistory.yaml' CODEGEN_CONFIG_PATH='./config.priceHistory.yaml' GENERATED_FOLDER_NAME='generated-price-history' yarn entity-helpers-codegen && yarn unit-test-codegen && yarn state-change-codegen
scripts.integration-test: SYNC_MODE="FULL_GRAPH" make set-graph-sync-mode; jest test ./integrationTests; SYNC_MODE="DATA_ONLY" make set-graph-sync-mode;
scripts.setup-integration-test: yarn res:build; yarn update-test-schema; yarn test-codegen
scripts.unit-test: make set-graph-safety-true; graph test; make set-graph-safety-false
